capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: The role requires achieving significant environmental outcomes through the development and implementation of water programs, plans, and projects.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Extensive project management experience is needed to manage resources and prioritize competing demands effectively.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Requires analytical skills to develop practical solutions for water management, conservation, and stakeholder collaboration.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Responsible for monitoring and reporting on environmental outcomes, adhering to legislation, policy, and managing risks.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Collaboration with cross-regional teams, stakeholders, and partners is essential for successful water management and conservation efforts.

capabilities.name: Influence and Negotiate
capabilities.description: Experience in negotiating successful resource management outcomes and resolving conflicts among diverse interest groups.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Extensive experience in managing environmental water monitoring, evaluation projects, and project evaluations.

capabilities.name: Manage Reform and Change
capabilities.description: The role involves implementing changes in water management practices and conservation programming in line with legislative reforms.

skills.name: Environmental Water Management
skills.description: Expertise in managing, planning, and policy development for river and wetland ecosystems.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Ability to engage and negotiate with diverse groups for successful resource management outcomes.

skills.name: Legislative Compliance
skills.description: Understanding and adherence to water management legislation, policies, and reforms.

generalRole.name: Conservation Program Management
generalRole.title: Senior Wetlands & Rivers Conservation Officer
generalRole.description: This role focuses on the development and implementation of environmental water programs, stakeholder management, and ensuring compliance with relevant legislation, which fits within the broader category of Conservation Program Management.
